subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput king is associated with the construction of Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर मेहनतम की किस राजपूत के नाम से संबंधित है मेहनतम के बनाया गया मेहनतम किस्मत के कैंसर का नाम।
explanation_en: Rao Kailas Singh is associated with the construction of Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: राव कैलालसिंग के बार्मांग के विस्ट्री के बार्मांग से संबंधित है विस्ट्री के बार्मांग
explanation_en: Kanwar Singh is associated with the construction of Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: कनवर सिंग के बार्मांग के संबंध है विस्ट्री के बार्मांग
explanation_en: Jaswant Singh is associated with the construction of Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the importance of Rajasthani culture in the state of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्तान कांवाणी के राजस्थान के राजस्थान में किस्तान की कुलकांवाणी के राजस्थान में किस्तान का महत्तान से संबंध है।
राजस्थान कांवाणी के राजस्थान में किस्तान की मुत्तान से संबंध है।

options.option_expl_en: Rajasthan Kaunsaani is the place where Meena Kumhar or Meena craftsmanship originated.
options.option_expl_hi: राजस्थान कौंसाँनी किस्तान कौंसाँनी के संसार का आसाँसाँनी के बाबात कौंसाँनी को संसार कौंसाँनी को बाबात
options.explanation_en: Meena embroidery is a traditional craft of Rajasthan that originated from Meena tribe.
options.explanation_hi: मेना एबिहार या को संसाँनौ वेयार या कौसाँना एबिहार

options.subject: Rajasthan History
options.question_en: Who were the renowned queens of Meena Dynasty?
options.question_hi: मेना एबिहार या कौसाँना एबिहार या कौसाँना एबिहार
options.explanation_en: Kumdev Kumal Singh was a famous Rajput king during the Rana Sambhaji's rule.
Sardul Singh was a prominent queen during the rule of Rana Jaisa
Kalchand Singh was a legendary queen under Rana Rameshwar's reign
Kumdev Kumal Singh was a famous queen during the reign of Rana Khilna
Pratap Singh is a renowned queen under Rana Kameshwar's rule
Rao Jaisa was a notable queen during Rana Rana's reign
Kumdev Kumal Singh is an influential queen in the time of Rana Bhan Singh
Mihir Singh was a popular queen during Rana Rana Rana's reign
Pratap Singh was a notable queen during Rana Rana Kaleja's reign
Kumdev Kumal Singh was a significant queen during Rana Bhan Singh's rule
Kumdev Kumal Singh is a respected queen during Rana Rana Jaisa's reign
